attributes.action: Victims - Access to Justice When Failed By The Legal System
attributes.additional_details: This petition is for members of the public who are victims of crime and have been let down with the Justice System and one or all it's agencies.  The law as it stands allows the victim no recourse other than to ask the Attorney General to look at the sentence - if one is passed and ask him to appeal an unduly lenient sentence.  If you buy a pair of shoes and they are faulty you have more legal rights than you do if your loved one is brutally murdered, in 2012 this cannot be a fair and just system.  When Judges undermine other Judges how can we trust in this broken system?
